I learned how to become a filmmaker. I was able to to cultivate editing, interview, sound, and production skills.

Strengths: a comprehensive, applied workshop to filmmaking + no lectures
Weaknesses: a bit more structure in the course and hands-on tutoring would help

The strength of the course is the year long format that gives students the opportunity to work over an extended period of time on one project. It is also a great setting to work in a community of others and being able to get feedback and see others bringing ideas into an actual project. 

The weakness of the course is perhaps the amount of things we have to learn on our own in order to put a film together. Maybe more in-depth and hands on sessions around things like editing, interviewing , sound, ect.
